website_summaries.verdict: Numerous colors and sizes available for different breeds of dogs, plus a lifetime guarantee.
pros: Customers love the quality they receive with this leather collar
Two rings included – one for the leash and one for tags
Leather in the collar stands up to rough treatment while maintaining its great look
cons: Some customers say it's tough to measure properly to order correct size
Leather may rip where rings attach

website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line collar that is attractive and built to last – the best on the market today.
pros: Showcases top-quality, hand-stitched leather with soft leather interior padding
Sports rust-free brass hardware including a dog tag ring
cons: It runs large, and it may be too thick for some very small dogs

customer_reviews.title: Too Big - UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar, but too big. Our 55 lb lab mutt has a 17" neck, but the collar needed to be taken in an inch or two to fit so we had to return. Sizing is off, so be cautious if you are on the cusp like we were. UPDATE: we were contacted by customer service immediately after our initial review. We were sent a smaller size, and they even offered us a discount! Now that's customer service! They said they also updated the product measurements so they should be more accurate moving forward. This collar is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sara

customer_reviews.title: The best collar if you know how to take care of it.
customer_reviews.text: When you order this collar, order some mink oil and rub the collar down to water proof it and cover up any scuffs or scratches. When the collar arrive and we were adjusting it for our pup she scratched a few places. It wasn't very noticeable and after treating it with mink oil they disappeared. The collar design is genius. No more reaching under and fishing for the leash loop. I will order another as my dog grows. *Mink oil may cause your collar to turn a bit darker. The first photo is before the oil and the second is when I first applied the oil. I let the collar cure overnight and it lighten up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Eat your heart out Justin Bieber
customer_reviews.text: Little Marco the puppy, who is something of a ladies' man, loves to show off this collar to all of the girl dogs at the park. He especially likes that there is an extra attachment for his ID tag, which makes it very easy for him to give out his digits. Update: Marco finally grew into the large tan/blue collar and I've included these since there are a lack of photos of the tan/blue collar. They both look terrific!
customer_reviews.author: triplebeam1988

customer_reviews.title: We love these collars
customer_reviews.text: We love these collars. They are top quality leather. Both function and looks! My dogs look amazing in them and they fit great. We have American bulldogs. We also added halter sized name plates at our local tack store.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney schweppe

customer_reviews.title: Caution - your dog may escape due to poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Metal loop broke completely off the one month old collar when attached to a leash. Dog escaped and ran into traffic. The metal loop embedded in the leather collar literally broke off - the leather did not break, rather, the metal loop that a leash gets hooked to on the collar broke in half while dog was hooked to leash. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the large size collar for our 8 month old golden and it fits great, but he also has some growing room!! We absolutely love the material and quality! Also, the owners of the company are more than helpful! Great purchase and I will definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ring for leash broke, dog almost ran away.
customer_reviews.text: The metal D-ring snapped in half and I had to run after my dog. This collar only has the illusion of a high quality product. Extremely dangerous, completely not recommend. My dogs' previous collar lasted over 3 years with no problems and it was just a cheap one from the local pet store. Overall I'm really disappointed and will be seeking a return/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This product had great reviews, so I was so excited to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars is I could. My 20 pound dog was out on her lead tonight and pulled hard enough to break the leather (picture attached). If I weren’t watching my dog from the door, who knows where she would be now. This product had great reviews, so I was so excited to get it, but it pains me to think about my dog being lost because of a faulty collar. My dog had been wearing this collar for less than 20 days, so it wasn’t even due to wear and tear over time. Protect your dog and don’t get this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and puppy-proof
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar! I bought the medium it for my 70-ish pound 1 year old black & tan doberman, it looks really nice with his coloring and it's soft and flexible and very sturdy. Had it for about 2 months now and it still looks great even after all the dog parks/backyard digging/beach swimming/daycare. I also really like the ring on the back of this, makes it super easy to hook and unhook the leash when my hands are full or he's extra wiggly. I saw some reviews that it was irritating to the skin but we haven't had any problems. He's on the last hole so if he gets any bigger I'll come back for the large. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: tourdm

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice but sizing is completely inaccurate. My pup's neck measures precisely at 13" which should be comfortable in the small as it states 13.5" on last hole. He was choking when I put it on him. As reference, most collars that start at 14" as the next step up are far too big for him- he's not a large pup. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these collars. One tan and one pink. They are nice collars and I liked the idea of the padding. However, one romp outside in the snow and the pink collar looked like chipped paint. I contacted seller about this problem as they are advertised with a 100% guarantee. I received a nice reply and seller even offered to replace both collars and the two leashes I bought (despite the fact that you cannot guarantee against puppy teeth). I was pleased with the response and refrained from writing a negative review until after we tried it again. Unfortunately, there was no follow through on the offer to replace two collars and two leashes. An expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Mama C

customer_reviews.title: Tag ring broke in less than two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these collars i purchased. The first lasted us many months until our puppy outgrew it and needed a larger size. We received the new collar on December 8 and in less than two weeks, the tag ring came off and clearly was defective as you can tell that it came apart at a perforation. The actual collar itself is fine but not having the tag ring is a deal-breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Walker

customer_reviews.title: beautiful workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL for Athena, our standard poodle. It was too big, but collar was so well made and beautiful, we were going to have it altered locally to fit her. Van Duffy e-mailed me following up on the sale, and I told him, again via e-mail, that it was too big. He sent me the next size down, and it arrived within two days. GREAT SERVICE!! this is the best leather work I have seen in a dog collar. It looks great on Athena, and she knows it (of course). A great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality collar, particularly when you consider the price. The colors are true to description and the tan/coral looks fantastic on our muticolored mix dog. She weighs almost 70lbs but has about a 20" neck, and the large fits her with room to spare (on the second tightest hole). We have gotten multiple comments. I love that it's thicker (ours is 2") and solid looking. It stretches a bit (as all leather does) and I would not recommend for walking if your dog pulls at all on but we use a separate face-collar for that. I clean it with leather cleaner weekly and after a month of getting rained on and played in it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is notorious for escaping the house.(Luckily he doesn't go past the the front yard) I needed a durable collar for him. The collar was to big when we bought so he didn't start to wear it in January of this year. My dog has had this collar on for a month and half and the leather the held the d-ring for the tag broke! My puppy isn't that active so I'm shocked that this broke so fast. These collars aren't cheap (I bought 2 of them) and I thought they would last a lot longer. My other dog's collar is already fading and ripping. Don't waste your money, buy a cheaper collar.
customer_reviews.author: USMCchic

customer_reviews.title: Color Runs When Wet
customer_reviews.text: My white bull terrier played in his pool and this collar turned his neck brown. It stayed wet and he scratched and scratched before I noticed he had a big sore on his neck under his face. I have had the collar off a week and his neck is still brown. I sure hope that it eventually disappears. His neck is really brown, DARK BROWN.
customer_reviews.author: janice thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking collar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Great quality! Looks great on my 4 month Eng Bulldog. It's hard to take a picture because all of Spike's wrinkles get in the way, hence the photo from above and side. I would recommend this for any dog. Update 1/11/2020: I contacted this company because Spike’s collar is now 4 years old. It still looks decent except for scratches on the leather and a little fraying underneath. The company reached out to me by email and are sending a new collar out! What a great company! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Collar; Made to last!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this well made collar. Our dog is a determined and strong dog and could break through every collar we purchased at the local stores. My neighbor recommended this collar and company and decided to give it a shot. The craftsmanship is great and made of genuine leather. No shaving corners. Very well sewn. The metal rings for tags and leash clip are durable and securely in place. It is a buckle collar which eliminates one more thing to break. The inside part which lays against the skin is indeed soft as the description states. I also believe this is a great price point for the craftsmanship we see. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie P-D

customer_reviews.title: Great collar but watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well manufactured collar that is pretty much what I expected. Watch the sizing. I measured my dog's neck at around 16-17" and the medium which is suggested for up to 17.5" barely fits and is a bit snug. I decided to keep it hoping it stretches a bit vs go to the larger size but if your dog's neck is right on the cusp of two sizes, I'd suggest going to the larger direction. Better to trim/poke another hole vs squeeze your dog's neck.
customer_reviews.author: EW SF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful -- but bummed out.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so bummed! This collar is beautiful, sturdy, and well made. I have the lead to match and I absolutely love it. Unfortunately there is a problem with sizing of the collar. My dog has a neck size of 18.5 inches putting her on the small side of a large. I ordered a large, but when I put it on my dog it had far too much extra room -- it slips right off of her head. I wish the sizes over lapped just a little bit. Acording to the sizing chat the medium would have been too small, but the large is too large.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this collar but it broke after two days of wear and we lost her tag because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mghirardi

customer_reviews.title: Good collar that properly controls the excess length
customer_reviews.text: The collar appears very well made and designed. It's new so I don't know durability yet but it has a lifetime guarantee. Two features sold this collar. It's the first buckle collar that controls the excess collar length well, so it doesn't get caught on everything. I like that the leash loop is opposite the buckle. Very handy for attaching the leash as it's usually on the back of the dogs neck. Didn't realize till I received it that it has an small extra loop next to the buckle to hold tags. Keeps them out of the way in the leash loop.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look, feel, and way this spun on the dogs without hurting them. Friends would comment on how nice they looked. Love the leather and the color. Major disappointment was that both broke in about 6 months time. One - the ring for the dog tag broke and on the other, the ring where the leash was attached. Our dogs weigh about 75 pounds and those rings really need to be stronger. If the manufacturers ever put better rings on these, I'd buy them again but right now, I can't justify repurchasing these twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar.
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Dane looks awesome in this collar. He is 180 lbs and still growing. His buckle will still have 3 holes to accommodate his growth. Because he doesn't like water, I chose this leather padded collar. We have had labs in the past and we switched from leather to nylon for hygiene reasons when they got it wet. So this one never gets wet - I don't know what it would smell like. He seems very comfortable with the padded inside. There is a small ring separate from the buckle for his tags. Nice touch. Very easy to buckle.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaMom

customer_reviews.title: Great company & customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered size large for my dog since he was in between sizes, and going off of some reviews others suggested to size up. When I recieved the product it was beautiful and I was satisfied. It was just too big. I contacted the company and let them know my situation. I asked if there was a way to do a exchange for a medium or should I just return the large and re-order the medium. They responded quickly and let me keep the large collar (give it to a rescue dog or a friend) and sent me a medium free of charge! My dog and I are loving the new collar! I will be a returning customer !
customer_reviews.author: Lulani

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch quality in a collar for a larger dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought the large size for my 14-month old 75-lb female German Shepherd. The fit is very good with brass pin in the second to last hole at the end. She sure likes it more than the prong collar I have retired from her outdoor activities. Great quality, very well constructed and would seem to last for a long time. Also use the Soft Touch leather leash which is a nice match for the collar. The collar is pretty wide (1.5") which at first blush looked too big, but it's not. The collar doesn't abrade the fur or cause it to leave a noticeable "ring" of raised fur or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: GrayslakeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but it literally STINKS like rotting meat!
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the tan and light blue combination on my silver Weimaraner, and the feel of the leather and brass loops seem high quality. BUT, the sickly smell coming from the collar is more than I could bear. I've owned other leather collars that smell great, but this collar smells like something is rotting. I've left it outside to try to air out, but as soon as it warms up around my dog's neck, it begins to stink again. And, I bathe my dog weekly, so it's not her.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Leather, padded, extra loop for dog ID tags, everything I wanted in a collar
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a collar that wouldn’t make my pup scratch (rough surfaces on some collars) and that was durable and attractive and had an extra/separate ring for dog ID tags. That was my wish list and this seems to fit the bill! I will update, if needed, later. But this collar is lovely and sturdy and well-made. My dog is wearing it without irritation. I took a previous reviewer’s advice and rubbed golden mink oil into it a day before putting it on my puppy. The mink oil didn’t really change the color of the collar, which I was ready for it to do. (Pictures are post-mink-oiling). Very pleased and would re-order this collar in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of the best products I have bought on Amazon, and that is saying a lot. Other collars I have bought for my dogs came apart very quickly, thereby endangering my beloved pets. This is extremely sturdy, and the design is very well thought out. I like the fact that the loop for the leash is opposite of the buckle, so it's not in the way. I also like the smaller loop for attaching the dog tags, so they are not on the same loop where I attach the leash. I haven't tried it on, but it looks like it would be very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great collar and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my collar two months ago and was highly impressed. Fit and finish are perfect. Recently my wife and I took a trip to see family for Thanksgiving and my mother in law dog sat our 173 lbs. Great Dane. While dog sitting she said my dane went after a squirrel and when the leash went taught the D Ring on the collar shattered. When my wife and I returned, and I looked over the collar and it was still perfect condition, just missing the D Ring. I contacted Vaun Duffy on how to go about getting a new D Ring to repair the collar. They have gone above expectations in helping.
customer_reviews.author: Slamalama

customer_reviews.title: must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality leather collar that looked like a belt and when I saw this, I knew it was perfect! I love the ring on the back for the leash without having to twist the collar around and I also love the small ring under the buckle area where you can attach the dog tags! Honestly as soon as I saw that and the belt resemblance I was sold! It is thick with the extra padding and I could not be happier! I ordered a medium by mistake the first time and exchanged it for a small which fits PERFECT on my jack russell.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is one place for tags and a separate place to hook on the leash. This is my second purchase of this particular collar, although I chose a different color this time. The first one was two years old. It really isn't in bad shape so I might keep it as a spare but it might be valuable for a rescue organization. It's not as flexible as the Coach collars I bought in the past but it seems like Coach doesn't offer them anymore and these are a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching.
customer_reviews.text: Color washes off if dog gets wet. I suppose if your dog does not get wet you would like this. Disappointed as I love my dog, but not with a pink neck.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Strong and secure for a big dog
customer_reviews.text: I got the extra large collar for my 125-lb Great Pyrenees and I'm very happy with it. Despite his thick double coat, I can fasten the buckle on the next-to-last hole. The collar is too wide for full-time wear, but it's wonderful for taking him for a walk. When he decides to take off like a freight train and defend us from, say, UPS trucks or passing foxes, I'm confident this collar is strong enough to restrain him. The metal buckles and leash ring are also strong. Recommended for your big dog.
customer_reviews.author: Oldhousegeek

customer_reviews.title: Great look and feel!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bernese Mountain Dog who is about a year old and 85 lbs. I bought him the Large and it fits perfectly with a little room to grow. It is also very soft so I do not worry about it digging into his neck if he pulls on the leash. The width is thick, but it looks great. There is the brass closure which naturally hangs underneath the neck and then there is also a brass loop that naturally sits on top the neck, which is great for quickly attaching the leash with no added hassle! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good quality leather collar for their dog.
customer_reviews.author: lLesli

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I give it a four star only because it is a better leather collar than many I have seen on Amazon. The inner soft padding is made of a synthetic material that looks like leather, so in the long run, it will fall apart. The leather does have a weird smell. It is not soft and it is heavy. Even for a large dog, it is kind of bulky to wear. Found a high quality leather collar and leash which are Amish-made from a company called Leerburg. Try both and find out yourself.
customer_reviews.author: JJ.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Collars
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. I purchased this item twice. I bought it in the medium size and it was too small. Then I returned it and purchased the Large. Way to large and not made well at all. I am now buying a new collar because it cracked and did not hold up . I have only had it roughly 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Burke

customer_reviews.title: After 4 years of rough ownership, this collar is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar for 100 pound German Shephard over four years ago. She swam in it all the time and lived a very active lifestyle. The collar is beautiful, from the stitching to the bronze. I order at least one time a week off Amazon (for years now). I think this may be the first review I've ever written. I had to let my girl cross the rainbow bridge last week and am ordering another for my puppy. just wanted to let you all know you will absolutely get comments in public about how beautiful the collar is.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality leather collar
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a higher-end leather collar for my bulldog. The price seemed low for a high-quality collar, but I tried it anyway. It has been great so far. It's thick and has padding, and the leather and stitching seems good so far. I'm about 2 months into using it and no problems. The D-ring on top is great for his leash. Still smells like leather too. The nylon collars I always used end up smelling so bad, but no issues with this. I think this is a great value and it looks great on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Enginepy

customer_reviews.title: Way too wide
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product and the seller's description. I need an extra large dog collar but not an extra wide collar. This is so wide I would feel sorry for any dog that had to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Vic in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Collar
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have a German Shepherd and a Rottweiler, both very active and playful farm dogs. Our girls will swim in the pond, run through the woods, and find every mud pit there is, and these collars still look brand new. The pups do not seem to be irritated by them at all, and the collars are very sturdy and well made. We do not foresee having to replace these, but if we do, or we get another pup, we will definitely be purchasing one of these collars again.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome construction!  So sturdy and so well designed.
customer_reviews.text: The collar fits very well, seller has a good sizing chart. My four-legged baby not only looks like a princess, but is so secure. I really love the separate leash ring, and the the second loop to hold the loose end of the collar, so that it doesn't "stick out". This collar matches the leash by the same company BEAUTIFULLY, they are sold separately, and the tag is not included-for anyone looking at my picture. I think I got great value for my money with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much we're buying it again !
customer_reviews.text: This collar is perfect in every way. Soft edges, real leather. The details are well made. We added another hole to the medium size collar to fit our 3 month old puppy when we first got him. He's now 7 months and we just added a very last whole. We'll have to buy the size large collar very soon. Im getting the same one, I love it so much. We got a good (4) months out of his collar however, I really thought we wouldn't have to get another one but this puppy is 75pds now growing strong ! We have the matching leash. He gets complimented at least once a day !
customer_reviews.author: RJulio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these collars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these collars. Although we do live on a farm and it's hard to find a nice leather/leather looking collar for your mini dachsunds these are great. Now max (our male) lost his some how and a few days later we found it, he must have got him up on something and it cut it in half. I did reach out to the owners and they replaced it. I appreciate that. These are nice collars for the price. We order a size small for our dogs and they have plenty of room to grow. So glad we purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: KParks

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. Will put in harms way if collar snaps, as did mine!
customer_reviews.text: This collar snapped. Two pieces. Dog running. Tried to catch her. Terribly made. Should be sturdy enough for normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy-Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Obviously a Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if Spanky will appreciate this neck belt (collar) but I am sure we will. He's a visitor who spends weekdays with us. For sure he will look his bulldog best wearing this upscale collar and we will definitely enjoy a return to putting the collar on in lieu of putting the harness on. So far as I'm concerned he is rid of the harness for good because he always looked miserable in the harness and constantly worked to gnaw it off.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh man

customer_reviews.title: Great collar! Probably not real leather tho
customer_reviews.text: I like this collar a lot. However if you’re looking for nice leather, this is not it. Real leather doesn’t peel. With that said, I love the look and it’s held up really well. I have a Belgian Malinois so you know it’s taken a beating. Love the brass as well. I wish they would use real leather because it’s such a good looking design. I’ve ordered 2 and will continue. I also often get compliments on it. Thumbs up over all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Cirone

customer_reviews.title: How to properly fit this collar ?
customer_reviews.text: Following the directions for measuring my dog we ordered the large size. Love the materials used and softness of the leather. Using it on my dog the first time showed that the last hole was still very loose... more so than expected. According to your description the medium would be to tight around my dogs neck. What do you advice for me to do?
customer_reviews.author: Devika

customer_reviews.title: Best collar ever! Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very well made and the quality is surprisingly great. I have tried several other collars because my dog's constant allergic reactions and this is the only collar her skin accepted well. If it wasn't enough, she also looks so cute wearing this collar. If you decide to buy it I can assure you won't regret. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Tough as Huskies
customer_reviews.text: If you are tired of buying Collars that keep breaking because your dog is too strong and keeps breaking them, look no more, this is the color for you. I have two Siberian huskies that were born to pull, they have broken every Collar I’ve bought them Except this one. It’s been one year and the collar is as good as new. The quality and craftsmanship of this collar is great. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Boriqua

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar at first, but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: On it's own it is a beautiful dog collar - soft, sturdy hardware, apparently well made, fits well. But my dog (Labrador) had it on for less than 12 hours and in that time it was horribly scratched. He is indoors only and we do not have another dog. He does not itch or scratch at all. This was from normal activity and wear. The scratches were obvious as the dye/color is superficial. So it became very unattractive quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Yeh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: These collars are attractive, soft & comfortable for the dog and well made. These are replacing rolled leather collars that were coming apart after. They are more noticeable, being quite a bit wider, but they look so nice it doesn’t bother me. An unexpected & delightful surprise is that the ring to attach a leash is opposite the buckle - so it remains at the top of their necks for very easy hook-up. No more searching under their chins for it while they’re all excited.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Durable, looks great, and if comfy for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this collar and so is my pup! I purchased this collar about 6 months ago and it is still holding up beautifully. Our pup is always getting compliments on his collar and how classy it looks! It is soft and comfortable for him to wear and VERY durable. He has spontaneously jumped into water with it on multiple times and it is holding up great! Definitely suggest getting this collar for your pet. He is a 55lb golden retriever and the large fits him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ford

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and elegant
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this collar. We have a large and strong dog and wanted a nice looking collar that wouldn’t let go if he decided to pull. This collar is made with a thick outer layer and a soft padded inner layer which looks quite smart. We found that a large size fitted our Chessie quite well will a couple more holes for expansion as he grows (he’s 10 months old now)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is very well made
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this collar for my dog, it’s sturdy and looks great on her. She’s very strong and the D ring seems like it will hold up to her ‘squirrel’ moments. It does leech smells, so I would suggest being careful using it in water (we used it at the beach and it smells funky now, but that’s the nature of leather). Overall very happy with it and need to get one for my little Pom.
customer_reviews.author: sarandipity

customer_reviews.title: Boss!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome collar. Bought for our boxer. Got the black and he looks boss!! This thing is definitely durable. Takes the water well though we do try to take it off before "planned swims" The collar loop is durable as well, and the stictxhing is nice all around. We trust this collar. I only wish we could have had an option to get it a little wider. Dog would be a pet bear.
customer_reviews.author: H.Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these collars (one medium and one large) less than two months ago. Neither is used to attach the leash for walking (we use harnesses instead), so I am extremely disappointed that both collars are already showing signs of tear - the medium blue one is looking all chaffed on the outside, while the large has tearing on the inside. These collars are not worth 25$.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, runs large, smells like leather
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very nice collar. It does run large as noted by others however the only smell I detected was the pleasant smell of leather. The padding side is pleasantly soft. The tag ring is small & obtrusive while the leash ring is large and appears sturdy. My 70 pound coonhound is well mannered on leash so I cant speak to the durability under stress. My dogs neck is 19" and I do have the collar on its smallest setting
customer_reviews.author: Savant

customer_reviews.title: Soft Touch Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size initially because my dogs neck size was on the "cusp". Looks to be well made. I like the fact that it has a separate "ring" for dog tags and also a separate "ring" to attach a leash. My only question is whether the lining on the inside of the collar is leather. If you order please follow their sizing chart - it is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: his collar is so nice! The inner lining is soft, the outer leather is tough and feels really well made. There is an attachment point for collar tags and a separate attachment point for a leash. I really like this collar and highly recommend it to other purchasers. I have a 1 year old Boykin spaniel weighing 38 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: RedBeast

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This collar is beautiful, it is such wonderful quality but even the smallest collar on the closest hole is too big and my small dog can wiggle her way out of it. It is such good quality that I am not confidant in using my belt bole maker to put another hole in it. I wish the small would have one more hole. If seller sees this review and can add another hole I would pay extra to get it! Let me know!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Paxman

customer_reviews.title: Good looking collars, but check the loop
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 collars, after reading the reviews and measuring their former collar, for my Siberian Huskies. They are really great looking collars. I put the new collars on during lunch break and when I got home 4 hours later I saw the end of Athena's brand new collar all chewed up like a shark attack! The loop to hold the end down is too loose and she unfortunately took advantage of that. The brown collar for Odysseus is great, tighter loop to hold the end of collar down. The collars are very nice but highly recommend you check that loop to make sure it stays in place, especially if your fur baby is a chewer!
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and luxurious for your pup
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar so far!! We got the 24” for our German Shepherd and it fits great! It feels SUPER luxurious and soft and comfortable! Seems really sturdy! He’s been wearing it for a few hours and I see it gets scratched easily but what do you expect from soft nice leather? No bid deal to us. Worth the money and he looks so handsome in it! Got the matching leash too.
customer_reviews.author: Critical reviewer that doesn’t like to waste money

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has very sensitive skin and has broken out from wearing other collars. She's been wearing this one for a few months now and no issues. It looks amazing on her (def has the appearance of a higher priced collar), to boot. My only complaint is that when she scratches herself, sometimes it marks up the collar but I'd imagine that would happen with any collar that's not woven. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MR Kal

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, and Comfortable collar for you and your dog.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this collar for several days now an so far the collar has held up to my expectations. The leather is soft on both sides. The stiching hasn't frayed, or a loose stich. If you like the the smell if leather, you got it. Its easy to clean when my German Shepherd rolls in the mud. The padding is great for your hands when you're holding a lunging dog. It doesn't cut in to your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Irritated dog's skin
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful collar that seemed well-made, but it irritated my dog's neck. We had to take it off her. Then she ate it. In the process it stained her fur. We just induced vomiting. Poor pupper. She'll be fine, but we'll be replacing it with a nylon collar.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dog breeds
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collars but unfortunately even the small size was too large for my 18lb terrier mix. I measured my dogs neck before purchasing and noticed the length of the collar might be too large. But feeling optimistic (due to such beautiful collars) I ordered it anyway. Yes, even strapped at the lowest hole, the collar was still too large. Essentially, if your dog goes in the 'small dog' park, these collars will be too large for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: I like nature

customer_reviews.title: The collar in medium seems "overbuilt" in thickness and width for a French Bulldog.
customer_reviews.text: The Luxury Real Leather Padded Dog Collar while seeming well built also seemed oversized for my small French Bulldog. The length was fine in medium for him but the width and thickness was "heavy". I went back to a lighter built thinner collar for the Frenchie.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great collar! I bought 2 for my pups who normally wear small collars. Great quality but when one came in today I tried it on both my dogs that normally wear small collars and it was way to small. I guess I'll have to return them and go up a size. Update it took a bit of time to get a replacement since the post office lost the first one. The medium came in and fits my girl very well. I spoke to Gary who was super helpful and answered almost right away. Thanks again so much
customer_reviews.author: ajc

customer_reviews.title: forget the sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: A well-made product; luxuriously soft leather, both outside and inside. Brass hardware and a lifetime warranty make this purchase a no-brainer, though keep in mind their sizing chart is a GUIDE. I had to return a Medium that was grossly oversized on my 4 year old beagle, based on Soft Touch measurements. I'd like to see more width on the smaller collars, 5/8" is a bit too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: timekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a luxury collar for my German Shephers as described
customer_reviews.text: Collar received was better than picture, the description of the product was accurate and helped me to make my decision. The reason I bought the collar was that the collar had no hash dyes or chemicals. The listing contained vital information that others did not, it was clear and gave sizes and product information that I actually received. Especially on the collar inside was soft and padded yet was also strong in materials used outside the collar. I was thrilled to find this collar listed with many of the features I wanted for my pet and was thrilled when I received the collar. I received the collar fast and was packaged well Thank you Van Duffy Products!
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good collar. This is my second purchase. Our dog has been wearing the first one for 2 years and it is still in pretty good shape, even after tons of swimming and mud baths and dog daycare. Bought a new one just to get a new color. The inside padding is nice and the overall quality is top notch. Love the hook for the leash and it stays on the top of dog's neck.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa W

customer_reviews.title: Best collar ever
customer_reviews.text: Best collar ever. Very well made and beautiful quality. Highly recommend. I would definitely put the collar on and then decide exactly where you want the tag before punching the holes for it. We made this mistake and now the tag is slightly covered by the collar strap, that's our fault though!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog collar! I probably could have purchased it in a size smaller because we created new holes to fit better. I love that it has a loop for the tags and a loop for the leash. It is also a very handsome looking collar! We also ended up cutting the end off because I purchased the wrong size our dog was always trying to grab the loose end.
customer_reviews.author: Stephani

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too wide
customer_reviews.text: Great looking collar, but way too wide. I loved the color, but am going to have to return it and get a color I don't like as much in the slimline line. I also have to return the brown and pink one I got because it was way too big on my other dog, and too wide as well. They seem like nice collars though. I just don't like the dogs to look like they have a belt around their necks. Hopefully the slimline collars are less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: This leather collar is well-made and seems as if it is comfortable for my dog. As for size, I got a small collar for my 20 pound terrier mix and he takes the second-to-last hole. I should have perhaps bought a medium, but this works (and he is nearly 3 so I doubt if his neck will grow :)).
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Clemens May

customer_reviews.title: Big collar for big dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a big collar. I bought it for our great pyrenees puppy, he's eight months old and absolutely massive. This is the first collar I've found that you can actually kind of see under all his fluff. It's still a little big on him, but he'll grow into it quickly. Previously he wore a collar with a plastic buckle...you couldn't see it on him, and if he pulled a little it would just come off so it was basically useless. I was looking for something hefty, I think this will fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: By far everything that was promised and worth the money. Reading the reviews helped a lot with selecting the correct size. I'd suggest to measure your pets neck without the two finger gap, the collar sizes are exact. It's sturdy, well made and the addition loop for the dog tags is a great addition. I purchased the large because all my dogs are bigger breeds. The width of the collar was perfect didn't look too big or too small on them. By far the best leather collar I've purchased yet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carns

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was wider than I expected, but I ended up loving that aspect! Especially because her fur gets so big in colder weather that normal collar widths don't stand out. It smells exactly like the leather on my horse saddle/bridle so it seems authentic! They're honest when they say it's soft, too. I love it so much I bought the leash to match today as my old one is fraying. She's gotten a lot of compliments on the collar (even though she hasn't had it long) even by people who don't see her that often to notice! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Super soft collar, sturdy and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: This collar is really soft. I have had this for about a year now and it has started to show signs of wear and tear. I am hoping for the seller to contact me as it was advertised for a lifetime warranty. Update 2/9: Great customer service. The seller contacted me and sent me a replacement collar free of charge and delivered on the next business day. I’m very impressed not just with the softness of the collar but also with the seller who stands behind their promise.
customer_reviews.author: Nik J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar, outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 20-month old 85-pound Rottweiler who is in training as a tracking/rescue dog. At the smallest adjustment it fits her 21" neck perfectly with adequate room to expand as she grows. First day of use was in heavy rain and thick brush. The collar resisted water and scratches. Also has a small brass loop near the buckle for attaching a tag. The lining is soft and comfortable. This is a very well-made, durable collar. Highly functional and elegant in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Deitrick

customer_reviews.title: Leather is splitting at D-Ring
customer_reviews.text: Bough this in July 2017 ( about 15 month from this writing). I love the color, generally it well made and looks good. So, why the 3 stars. The leather is starting to split at the D-ring where the leash gets attached. Eventually it will break. This is kin-off big, else it would have 5 stars. My dog is about 55 lbs, not small, but not that large.
customer_reviews.author: Henk

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: My dog wears his collar a few times a week. Most of the time it is just for going on long walks, but it also gets worn into the lake. It has held up very well, considering it gets wet and stays on for a few hours. My favorite feature is the leash loop opposite of the adjustable clasp. Purchased the tan/teal and tan/coral.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Kate

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The collar itself is lovely, all leather, soft, sturdy and it handles my 40lb pit Nacho very well. It still has its lovely leather smell after a month of use. I didn't measure my dogs neck well and I didn't account for him growing since he's still a pup and got the wrong size. I contacted the owner and they resolved the issue in record breaking time. Their customer service was outstanding I even mentioned it to my husband and he agreed. Their products are wonderful so is their customer service, I will definitely shop their products again. Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine732

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, high quality collar
customer_reviews.text: My 1 yo German shepherd puppy loves her new collar; its just like her big brother's collar (only a couple of sizes smaller). We previously purchased an XL collar for our older GS dog, and I was so impressed by it that I had to have one for Freya, too. I like this collar because its tough, and still looks great years later!
customer_reviews.author: ReiSli

customer_reviews.title: Big, bulky, fit only for a horse
customer_reviews.text: My dog's neck fell in the large size-18"-19". The sizing is correct, but had I actually seen this product, I would have known it never would work for her. The collar is HUGE! Yes, it fit squarely around her neck, but it was like something to put on a horse. She instantly started trying to get it off. The pictures and description are deceiving; it is bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: NanaCA

customer_reviews.title: A QUALITY DOG COLLAR
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality leather collar for our 7 month German Shepherd. This collar is made of high quality leather and brass leash hook. It is pleasing to the eye. I’m satisfied. The quality exceeds what I expected. The small leather/brass hook designed to hold a license, etc didn’t last long before the leather broke . Otherwise I’d rate this collar wit 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: David K LANGDON

customer_reviews.title: Everything the reviews said and more!
customer_reviews.text: The product is top notch. I have a dog whose leash was breaking down after time. I decided to buy a collar as well. I measured his neck and placed the order after much deliberation. There was an issue with my order, however it was from my part. I quickly contacted the seller and was blown away by the quick response and willing to provide a solution. I have been usin this collar on my dog for several weeks, and have been complemented on it. He doesn't seem to mind it and the rich plush feel doesn't seem to have any ill effects. Would recommend to dog owners who want that luxury look And quality.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Impressive & luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I do not own a dog. However, I can report that the Large collar fits a man with a 19" neck. The leather is luxuriously soft, and every stitch shows the impressive workmanship put into the collar. In addition, it's got an impressive heft, at nearly a quarter of a pound. Despite this, it's comfortable to wear for an extended period of time & stands up to vigorous play. It does not lock. Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Trivimp

customer_reviews.title: WAAAAY better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: However, the great leather arrives a bit dry. You'll need to oil it heavily over days before it really comes to life. Once oiled and rubbed a bit, it looks great. Be warned, it will darken considerably once oiled. Myself, I don't care nor did my dog. btw, it has a small loop to hold the dog's tag adjacent to the other loop where the leash is attached. Nice touch because the dogs tag hangs squarely down in front of his chest while the leash attaches squarely top side. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Don MarcosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really, really sharp collar!!
customer_reviews.text: Our pup has been wearing this collar for almost a year now. If anyone has questions about the durability, this collar is fabulous. He has swam in the pool with it (saltwater and chlorine pools), in the lake as well as been out on hikes in the AZ sun and this thing is just so sturdy. It's a very, very nice alternative to the poly/nylon collars that anyone could find at a pet store, and is super sharp looking. I love that there are two straps for the end of the collar so the end isn't flopping about. Additionally, the ring on the top side of the collar is super strong and great for clipping the leash on. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: rea6s

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I purchased this item because of the reviews and I couldn’t be more happy and excited because my 2 year old boxer looks extremely stylish meanwhile practicing safe measures to keep him on a leash through his collar. I took him out today and I was complimented. The collar is sturdy and looks fashionable I’d buy this item all over again!
customer_reviews.author: AllyCamacho93

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: We have always used Orvis collars for their quality but started looking for a more substantial collar for our American Stafforshire Terriers, 60 & 70 lbs, with 20" necks. After reading the reviews I felt this was the best collar. I love the quality of the leather. They are well made and should stand the test of time. However the hardware is excessive in size and weight and is actually uncomfortable for the dogs when they are laying down. Sadly I will have to try to sell these collars and start the search again for collars that are more user friendly for our dogs
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: STIFF and NOT SOFT
customer_reviews.text: This is so thick and chunky. The blue is soft to touch, but the whole thing is hard. Also, while a small fit my dog (on the 2nd hole out), there was so much excess that it only added to the thickness and stiffness. It's beautiful and seems well-made, but the stiffness and thickness are deal breakers.
customer_reviews.author: MinnaOne

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Leather Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these collars for our German Shepherd two years ago. It is still in great shape. We just got another German Shepherd and got one of these collars for him. They are very sturdy, but are also soft and comfortable to hold on to. The extra ring on the top is very handy. It gives a good place to connect a leash without getting tangled in the tags. It is the best collar we have ever had for our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: SB Spanish Fork

customer_reviews.title: Great collar.
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and well made. I affixed an engraved brass nameplate, and think it makes my dog look classy. I underestimated how much I love the leash ring being on top instead of near the tags. She's hopped in the creek several times wearing this with no sign of damage or color distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collar
customer_reviews.text: We have had this collar on our puppy for a few months now and it looks as good as the day we bought it. It's gorgeous, convenient, made well, and tough as nails. We love it, and will order again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality collar
customer_reviews.text: Waited awhile to purchase this so I could see how big of a neck my shepherd pup would grow into, he ended up needed a larger size than I expected so I’m glad I waited and it’s still a little loose at the smallest notch but he’s still not a year old yet so he’s got room to grow. Otherwise, the craftsmanship is top quality and my pup seems to enjoy his new attire. The buckle and ring for tags are sturdy and durable and the leather is a great finish and the inside does have a nice cushion to it. Definitely a worth-while purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Payne

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the right price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made with hardware that is sturdy and good looking. I especially like the leash ring being on the opposite side of the buckle. It makes leashing and unleashing a breeze! Wish all collars were manufactured with this option! The padding is a Goldilocks thickness. The leather is somewhat stiff and thinl it'll loosen/soften over time.
customer_reviews.author: TLight

customer_reviews.title: Best collar I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for my cocker spaniels and they are sturdy and attractive but most importantly have the loop on top to attach the dog leash. This makes it so much easier than collars where the loop is under the dog's chin to attach the leash. I do hope they will offer more color choices in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CGA

product_meta.title: Soft Touch Collars - Luxury Real Leather Padded Dog Collar
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:BrownSoft Touch Collars Padded Leather Dog Collar, Large Brown - Genuine Real Leather, 24" long x 1.5 Wide, Fits Neck Size 18" to 21" Inches
feature_bullets: FITS DOG NECK SIZE 18 to 21 INCHES - Width is 1.5 inches - Total Length of Collar is 24 inches - (Please measure your dogs neck size before ordering.) LOOKS GREAT WITH OUR MATCHING PADDED DOG LEASH - SEE BELOW -
NEED A PLACE FOR DOG TAGS? No problem, we have you covered with a built in small ring next to the buckle.

BEAUTIFUL TWO TONE COLOR WITH SEALED EDGE - Brown and cream with soft inside sheepskin leather padding. As dog lovers ourselves, we designed this dog collar with your dog's comfort in mind. The buckle and d-ring are made with solid brass hardware that's lacquered to prevent rust and corrosion.
SUPERIOR QUALITY AND WORKMANSHIP: Made with full grain NATURALLY TANNED genuine leather. No harsh chemicals or dyes are used. Why obtain average when for about the same money you can have the best.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE : We guarantee it, and we mean it. This is not a 30 day or 6 month keep your receipt “warranty”. We believe so strongly in the superiority of our product that we back it with a lifetime guarantee. If one of our collars ever fails due to materials or workmanship a replacement collar will be provided.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
